page.title: 05THE RUDOLF STEINER SCHOOL.
page.content: { { EDUCATION A full range of subjects,including human science,zoology and acoustics are taught in long carefully planned periods based on the pupils chronol- ogical age and ability to grasp the subject.In addition,artistic activities such as drawing,metalwork and woodwork are taught. { { BACKGROUND The Rudolf Steiner School is a non- profit organisation.The school provides education and board for chil- dren aged 5-19.When they leave they can either go to another Rudolf Steiner centre,or get an outside job. { { FAMILY UNITS These are where the children spend the nights and time off school.
